resources.string: You will be shown a 12 word recovery phrase. It will allow you to recover access to your account in case your phone is lost or stolen.
First time user? See our Help section
By registering you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Recovery phrase can help you to recover access to your account in case your phone is lost or stolen.
